PeriCAT - The PERICLES Content Aggregation Tool - is a framework for Information Encapsulation techniques.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
algorithm
This package includes all information encapsulation techniques.
controller
All classes that control the encapsulation process.
decisionMechanism
This package contains the classes for the distance calculations between algorithms and scenarios, and the classes related to the decision making on which algorithm to use for a scenario.
main
This package provides api classes to facilitate the use by other programs.
model
This package contains classes for the structured storage of payload information as byte stream.
view
Classes of the graphical user interface.
PeriCAT - The PERICLES Content Aggregation Tool - is a framework for Information Encapsulation techniques. It integrates a set of information encapsulation techniques from various domains, which can be used from within the framework. Furthermore PeriCAT provides a mechanism to capture the scenario of the user, and to suggest the best fitting information encapsulation technique for a given scenario.
